changelog.description: Browser Privacy Cleaner - Clear data from Safari, Chrome, Firefox, and Edge
Orphaned Files Scanner - Detect leftover files from uninstalled applications
Duplicate File Finder - Find duplicate files with SHA256 hashing
Menu Bar Monitor - Real-time CPU/RAM/Disk stats with 4 display modes
Permissions Management - Manage FDA and folder access permissions
Empty Trash functionality with confirmation dialog
Complete Theme system with consistent typography, spacing, and corner radius
Enhanced UI with standardized glass styling across all views
Improved app initialization to avoid unnecessary TCC permission prompts
Better localization support with runtime language switching
FDA detection with multiple fallback methods
Async update checking and command escaping
Thread safety in file scanning operations
Initial release with Liquid Glass UI design
Smart Scan for quick system cleanup
Disk Cleaner with category-based file management
Space Lens with treemap visualization
Performance monitoring and maintenance tools
Applications manager with Homebrew integration
Startup items and port management
System health dashboard
Multi-language support (English, Italian, Spanish)
